'''Qiaoying Village''' is a village in northwest [[Liyue]], bordering [[Fontaine]],<ref name="Liben May 2022">{{Ref/NPC|Liben}}</ref> known in the tea industry for producing high-quality tea.<ref name="zhongli tea event">{{Ref/Quest|Surrounded by the Aroma of Tea}}</ref><ref name="little meng pirate comm">{{Ref/Quest|The Little Pirate Goes Out to Sea}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/Quest|Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?}}</ref>

Some teas cultivated in Qiaoying Village include Tianheng Bohea and Qiaoying floral tea.<ref name="Liben May 2022" /> The village performs an annual tea-serving ceremony, using the wilted petals of Spiritscent Flowers to prepare floral tea.<ref>{{Ref/Arti|Soulscent Bloom}}</ref>

==Trivia==
*[[Yelan]]'s special dish, [[Dew-Dipped Shrimp]], uses Dipped Dew tea leaves cultivated in Qiaoying Village as an ingredient.
